testsuite.name: MainTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #4
There were not enough Threads started, you should process each file in a different Thread. You started 2 threads, but you need to start 10 threads. The executor.invokeAll() method might help. Also, don't forget to call .shutdown().
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test.
